channel.title: Runecrafting - Change it up?
channel.description:
No one likes runecrafting. It's a dry, dull, and boring skill. Especially on a rsps. That's why typically server's will set it's xp rate higher than the rest.
But lets change that. Lets change Runecrafting as a whole. Let's "reinvent the wheel"
I was thinking, maybe the skill could start like this: You get the essence, and the correct talisman (or tiara or what ever) and then use it on the correct altar. From there, you'd be teleported to a new location, based off the rune you're making. Example: I grab 27 rune essence, a air talisman, and use the essence/tali on the altar. I then get transported to a place where I'm tested on my wits using air.
What could we do for challenges? Like, what are some good idea's for challenges and such that could be used here.
Restrictions: They cannot be combat based (so skillers can do this too). if gfx/anims are used, they must be based off runescape's. (I don't have custom ones nor don't know how to make em). I only have revision 377 mapdata.

item.title: Runecrafting - Change it up?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Fire capez:

How about a maze that is randomly generated and utilities wind to damage the player if they get the wrong location, this could be applied to all aspects (water, fire) and for death runes it could kill the players thus making it rather daunting (increase the xp rate to make it a bit easier). Just a general idea, came up with it in a few minutes so i’ll post more when I get mentally stimulated lol.

I could see how that would work. Like go into a runecrafting room, and pick a maze based off what rune you’d want to do, and each one would have different affects and such

Read full topic

item.title: Runecrafting - Change it up?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Elrick:

If it comes to Runespan, then I would suggest upping the points per node, but having the spawn and despawn rates fast. Keep players jumping from platform to platform as much as you can without players complaining and then create a shop to trade those points in for runes and top tier runescrafting gear.

Runespan would be the last thing I’d ever want to implement…

Read full topic

[quote=“Elrick, post:38, topic:521869”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=640380.msg4317602#msg4317602 date=1371750102]

The whole point of this topic was to make Runecrafting more entertaining.
[/quote]that is the main topic yes but for it to be entertaining we have to know if you are going for long term entertaining (economical investment) or a short term enjoyment ( shop based )

We can discuss both and see what happens ^.^

What revision are we discussing?[/quote]
My server, has is 317 loading 508+.
So anything in that range and we should be fine,
But discussing the topic in general shouldn’t hurt?

item.title: Runecrafting - Change it up?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Elrick, post:33, topic:521869”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=640380.msg4317466#msg4317466 date=1371730314]
Because when you make an item harder to get it’s traded economically speaking if you have access to having there be millions of essence to just buy directly from a store gold isn’t being swapped between players.
[/quote]
I think I missed something in this conversation as a whole. Was this discussion based around a store containing essence to be bought from? Or are we looking at players legitimately earning their own essence via mining?[/quote]I was looking at it more from an economical standpoint either way…

In one sense you could have a stack of essence but to keep the skill “respectful” you have to make it hard. The only way to do this in an economy fashion is to make it harder to get/make people buy from other players.

In another sense you could keep it respectful by having it so you could mine it. No actual rule states you have to “mine essence” it could be something you craft from a “rock” for that matter.

Read full topic

Loveandpower:

Because when you make an item harder to get it’s traded economically speaking if you have access to having there be millions of essence to just buy directly from a store gold isn’t being swapped between players.

I think I missed something in this conversation as a whole. Was this discussion based around a store containing essence to be bought from? Or are we looking at players legitimately earning their own essence via mining?

item.title: Runecrafting - Change it up?
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:28, topic:521869”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=640380.msg4317035#msg4317035 date=1371668933]

[quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=640380.msg4317026#msg4317026 date=1371668030]

Use the ideas from Lunar Diplo. Make more puzzles in the dream world. I’d be entertained by that

I didn’t even think about that. I did lunar’s so long ago…

@The talk on stackable’s:

What if you made each stack only contain like 10-15. And as you progressed through the levels the stacks got bigger. Kind of like how they made the rune ess pouches.
[/quote]unless experience was really low I still don’t see that being respectful wise at least

Remember, I said something about timers a while back.
[/quote]think about it like this though timers don’t mean a whole lot when you can

-afk a skill because it is a timed event
-a skill doesn’t mean a lot if actual interaction isn’t needed look at runespan see what happened?
-generally on a rsps you need anywhere from 5k-15k rune essence to get just 99. So with a timer.you would have multiply experience by at least 10-20 for that skill…then you would have to as well a system where essence is “rarer” if you get essence in “groups” of 15-20.[/quote]

  1. If it was kept on a timer or # count before the action would break would be smart and ensured that players could not continually AFK the skill.
  2. Most skills lack interaction. It would be up to the community to deem RC worth training in groups and remain game-focused.
  3. Rather than making it rarer, why not just adjust the xp rate for RC compared to the rest of the rates for other skills? Magic is a really hard skill to continually train via combat, so by upping the amount of runes that may be produced, it will help balance out the issue to an extent.

Read full topic

I was on one of the top 5 rsps’s a could weeks back. You want to know how hard it was to runecraft deaths? Get 1-2k ess, stand in the bank and run to the zammy mage, click death rune, and run back.
They’re super popular. I don’t think there is an issue with what I was suggesting

Read full topic

item.title: Runecrafting - Change it up?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Elrick, post:22, topic:521869”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=640380.msg4316865#msg4316865 date=1371643476]
Coming from somebody who has 90+ runecraft on RS…do NOT make essence stackable. It would be alright to put a timer on there/increase rates accordingly…however stacking it will take away the “respect” portion of it.
[/quote]
Stacking seems like the right thing to do to a point. Putting 3-5 essence per inventory slot seems much more fitting (assuming essence is rather thin and not just a chunk of heavy round white rock. Same with herbs, but that is for another discussion :P[/quote]The only way that would keep it’s respect is if essence was hard to come by and it was more like currency so to speak

Read full topic

item.title: Runecrafting - Change it up?
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

Loveandpower:

Coming from somebody who has 90+ runecraft on RS…do NOT make essence stackable. It would be alright to put a timer on there/increase rates accordingly…however stacking it will take away the “respect” portion of it.

Stacking seems like the right thing to do to a point. Putting 3-5 essence per inventory slot seems much more fitting (assuming essence is rather thin and not just a chunk of heavy round white rock. Same with herbs, but that is for another discussion

Read full topic
